title: Where To Go
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 31 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR40L
description: Where is your favorite place to go? Where to Go shows students a variety of places they can visit. Repetitive sentences, high-frequency words, and vivid photographs support early emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to classify information as well as the proper use of nouns.
reviewWords: beach, game, museum, parade, playground, woods
comprehension: Classify Information                : Classify information in a text
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /g/ sound
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word go
